properties.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; Coachella Valley; San Diego County Inland Valleys
properties.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 3 at 12:59PM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the deserts tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low
as 30 degrees, and as low as 25 degrees tomorrow night. For the
San Diego County Valleys, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28
degrees, and as low as 25 degrees tomorrow night.

* WHERE...San Diego County Valleys, Coachella Valley and San Diego
County Deserts.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing

NWSheadline: FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
